ValidationRule.description: Prevent User from changing owner if Country, Lead Source and No of Employees are null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), NOT(CONTAINS('System Administrator,Contract Manager', $Profile.Name)), OR( ISNULL(NN_Country__c), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'None Selected'), ISNULL(NumberOfEmployees) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Country, Lead Source and No of Employees!
